product_name: Petzl Ultra Rush Accu 4 Belt Headlamp
long_description: Designed for demanding, fast-paced activities such as trail running, skiing and mountain biking, the Petzl Ultra Rush Accu 4 Belt headlamp has 6 powerful LEDs that throw a stunning beam up to 140m.
short_description: Designed for demanding, fast-paced activities such as trail running, skiing and mountain biking, the Petzl Ultra Rush Accu 4 Belt headlamp has 6 powerful LEDs that throw a stunning beam up to 140m.
